duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage day-to-day financial transactions including accounts payable, financing verification, and various other transactional issues.
Receive, review, and process all invoices from vendors, freight, and employee reimbursements, coding, and vouchering.
Check invoices for errors and amounts due to vendors. Daily vouchering of all merchandising invoices.
Calculate and reconcile discounts. Perform daily F/R audit for all regions, reviewing financing paperwork, funding, and tracking of all finance providers and disputes.
Track and pay Sweet Dream rewards payouts. Process weekly drivers’ invoices. Keep monthly records of all fixed assets.
Help with EOM and end of year duties.
Complete administrative tasks assigned by the Accounting Manager. Work on projects on an as-needed basis.

education_certification.credential: 3-5 years of accounting/bookkeeping experience preferred. Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field.
